WHY LOCUS FOR NETWORK OPTIMIZATION?

We work with our clients to model their supply-chain bottom-up and iteratively optimize for various scenarios basis flow, inventory and location, and model the cost-impact of the re-designed supply-chain.

Flow
Optimization

Locus tells you how should the product flow from one node to another (mode of transport and routes)?

We provide Warehouse-Distributor Remapping & Distributor-Retail Outlet Remapping: Flow-based optimization to reduce operating expenses costs without additional capital expenses.

Flow
Optimization

Location
Optimization

Locus tells you where should the product be sourced from?

The network optimization solution selects the ideal location for DC/RDC/Supplier to minimize overall logistics costs based on demand patterns, capacities, and service levels.
